publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3551 Murdo Fraser: T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005—That the Parliament congratulates T in the Park on its success in winning the awards of "Best Major Festival" and "Best Facilities and Organisation" at the UK Festival Awards 2005; recognises that T in the Park deserves these awards as its organisers put on a spectacular festival for over 60,000 fans each day, all with the backdrop of the stunning Kinross-shire countryside; further believes that these awards confirm that T in the Park is the United Kingdom’s friendliest festival; welcomes the festival’s work in promoting new breaking Scottish talent on the T Break Stage, X-Tent and Futures Stage; notes the importance of the festival to the Kinross-shire economy, and wishes the organisers continued success with future T in the Park festivals.

S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Chris Ballance*, Bruce Crawford*, Frances Curran*, Alex Fergusson*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Tricia Marwick*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Margaret Mitchell*, Irene Oldfather*, Mary Scanlon*, John Scott*, Bill Aitken*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Jim Wallace*

S2M-3551 Murdo Fraser: T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005—That the Parliament congratulates T in the Park on its success in winning the awards of "Best Major Festival" and "Best Facilities and Organisation" at the UK Festival Awards 2005; recognises that T in the Park deserves these awards as its organisers put on a spectacular festival for over 60,000 fans each day, all with the backdrop of the stunning Kinross-shire countryside; further believes that these awards confirm that T in the Park is the United Kingdom’s friendliest festival; welcomes the festival’s work in promoting new breaking Scottish talent on the T Break Stage, X-Tent and Futures Stage; notes the importance of the festival to the Kinross-shire economy, and wishes the organisers continued success with future T in the Park festivals. Supported by: Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Chris Ballance, Bruce Crawford, Frances Curran, Alex Fergusson, Alex Johnstone, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Tricia Marwick, Mrs Nanette Milne, Margaret Mitchell, Irene Oldfather, Mary Scanlon, John Scott, Bill Aitken, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Donald Gorrie, Mr Jim Wallace, Phil Gallie*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Fiona Hyslop*, Iain Smith*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Brian Adam*
S2M-3551 T in the Park Success at UK Festival Awards 2005 (lodged on 9 November 2005) Susan Deacon*
